articles.title: Child struck by school bus, driver arrested in Medway
articles.description:

articles.title: TD Bank plans to shutter 6 Mass. branches amid nationwide closures
articles.description:

articles.title: Longtime 7News anchor Kim Khazei is signing off
articles.description:

articles.title: How Mass. native Georges Niang reacted to Celtics’ decision to trade him
articles.description:

articles.title: Two Mass. men arrested in Harvard Medical School explosion
articles.description:

articles.title: ‘This has nothing to do with us,’ BPD commissioner says amid Karen Read attorney’s calls for disciplinary review
